name: password_converter
description: Create secure, deterministic passwords locally in your browser.
author: JPW

scripts.serve-local: if not exist gh-pages-temp\js mkdir gh-pages-temp\js && xcopy /E /I /Y public\* gh-pages-temp\ && copy src\converter.js gh-pages-temp\js\ && copy src\maskedInputController.js gh-pages-temp\js\ && npx serve gh-pages-temp
